did.unittitle: Audiovisual Collection

Bedford-Stuyvesant Clinics, Part 2

scopecontent.head: Content Note
scopecontent.p: This recording appears to be part two of the recording "Urban League Presents: Bedford-Stuyvesant Looks to Psychiatric Needs" on AV523. It is unclear whether this recording ever aired on WNYU.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: This tape is related to materials in RG 39.5, Records of WNYU (Radio Station: New York, N.Y.).

scopecontent.head: Content Note
scopecontent.p: This recording concerns the history of organ instruments. It was created by the Documentary Unit of the Communications Arts Group and broadcasted on WNYU. The host was Walt Michaels and the organist player featured on the recording is Dick Wolitoch.
